The JMP package (SAS Institute, 2002) was used for all statistical analyses. Mortality data were corrected by Abbott’s formula.
52 Differences in the number of conidia on the leaves and larvae survival were analyzed by a one-way ANOVA followed by a Tukey–Kramer honestly significant difference (HSD) for comparisons for all pairs. Difference in the number of attached conidia to the leaf surface was analyzed to the Student- t test. Probit analysis was used to obtain the LT50 data.
